careInstructions: Choose Ideal Climate & Soil – Thrives in warm, humid climates with clayey or alluvial soils.
Plant Healthy Seedlings – Use certified seeds and transplant seedlings with proper spacing.
Provide Irrigation – Maintain consistent water levels, crucial during tillering and flowering.
Apply Fertilizers & Mulch – Use balanced NPK fertilizers and organic mulch to boost yield.
Control Pests & Diseases – Monitor for rice blast and stem borer; use integrated pest management.
Choose Ideal Climate & Soil – Best in cool, dry climates with well-drained loamy soil.
Plant Healthy Seeds – Use high-quality, disease-free seeds with optimal seeding rate.
Provide Adequate Irrigation – Water during critical growth phases, avoiding waterlogging.
Apply Fertilizers & Mulch – Incorporate nitrogen-rich fertilizers and organic compost.
Control Pests & Weeds – Implement timely herbicide application and pest monitoring.
